result.markdown: --- title: "Andy MacLachlan" subtitle: "Associate Professor in Spatial Data Science and Visualisation" image: assets/profile.jpg about: id: hero-heading template: trestles image-width: 15em image-shape: rounded --- ::: {#hero-heading} I'm an academic in the Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis (CASA), University College London (UCL). I am driven in my career to have meaningful real world impact on the sustainability of our cities and empower students to become leading activists in urban spatial science. I take pride in my ability to explain complex problems in a simple manner, and in doing so, create an inclusive learning environment in which everyone can participate, contribute and excel.
